sub_title: I get things done | Business strategist | MBA, MA, LLB | Compelling vision & relentless execution
summary:
Seasoned public affairs leader and business strategist, with 13 years of project, resource and team management experience in the life sciences, animal health and FMCG/beverages sectors. 

Proven success in business strategy design and execution, policy, government relations, advocacy, market access, stakeholder engagement, and regulatory environment shaping. Recognised track record of building a strategic vision and the right teams to execute it, growing talent, and performance managing for success. I have designed and implemented growth-generating business strategies, including new opportunity scoping, market development, Route-to-Market, commercialisation models, and customer partnerships. 

Excellent communicator with the demonstrated ability to build and sustain relationships across the matrix. Problem solver, curious and resilient. With strong influencing and analytical skills, deep sense of ownership, and a growth mindset, I bring clarity to the most complex issues.
